name: Tezos Lottery #1 (9/17/21)
description:
Once you purchase this NFT and BURN it, you will be entered into a random lottery drawing to win the entire proceeds from all the purchases of this NFT!

You can purchase & BURN however many NFTs you want to gain better chances of winning. 

TO BE ENTERED IN THE LOTTERY, YOU HAVE TO BURN THE NFT!!!

On 9/17/21 @ noon CST all burn addresses will be collected and the number of NFTs you burn will be the number of chances you will have to win the entire TEZOS Pot of Gold.

The winner will be chosen by a random number generator which will be screen recorded and created into a special 1/1 NFT.

After the Lottery has concluded, all remaining NFTs will be BURNED and the winner will receive the special 1/1 NFT along with all of the XTZ this lottery brought in. 

Wishing everyone the best of luck and my the odds be in your favor!
